Yes-we do at times need to work with other people to get what we want, but =
it is still up to us to make the right decisions for the good of ourselves,=
 and do want we need to do to get where we need to go. We should not expect=
 or ask other people to forsake themselves to give us a free or easy ride.
=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: SnowfireL@... 
  To: EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 8:27 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP=
-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV






  April, realistically, I coul=
d not do it alone, not at my age, with the obligations and conditions,  I h=
ave lived with, maybe a teenager could survive, without food and sleep 3 or=
 4 days, without help, but even then they would look for help some where, w=
e all need each other, this is not a deserted Island, we live for our selve=
s and for each other.sf

  In a message dated 5/27/2009 9:53:26 P.M. Easter=
n Daylight Time, april@... writes: 

  "you could"=
